comment.body:
Awesome.
Glad to see the blog is active now.
I know this is new territory but how long do you think it will take to reach your final form? Meaning recording measurable results.

What should I read to get a good idea on what you're doing? I understand a decent amount about biology for everything you've said so far to make sense.

But if a lab rat wanted to DIY he would need to know more.
